name: Arrakis
resume:
Embark on a journey to the mystical desert planet, where giant sandworms roam beneath the dunes and ancient spice fields shimmer under twin suns.
   Walk through the majestic palaces of Arrakis, witness the Fremen‚Äôs hidden sietches, and experience breathtaking views of endless golden sands.
presentation:
Step into the legendary world of Dune, the desert planet of Arrakis, ruled by spice and mystery.
Explore the grandiose citadel of Arrakeen, navigate the perilous sand dunes, and uncover the secrets of the Fremen way of life.

Witness the colossal sandworms, participate in spice harvesting operations, and engage in exclusive survival training to adapt to the harsh desert climate.
Whether you're an explorer, a historian, or a thrill-seeker, Arrakis promises an experience unlike any other.

Embark on an unforgettable journey to the heart of Dune with a carefully curated 4-day program full of adventure and discovery.

schedule.description1:
Tour the capital city Arrakeen, including the palace, market districts, and key historical sites.
   Experience the fusion of ancient Fremen culture and futuristic architecture.
schedule.description2: Visit the heart of Arrakis‚Äô economy‚Äîthe spice processing centers. Learn how the spice is refined and its significance in interstellar trade.

schedule.description1:
Engage in a Fremen-led desert survival course.
   Learn to use stillsuits, navigate the sands, and conserve water like a true native.
schedule.description2:
Join an expedition to safely observe the legendary sandworms of Arrakis.
   Discover the delicate balance between these creatures and the planet‚Äôs ecosystem.

schedule.description1:
Embark on a guided trek through the deep desert to experience the awe-inspiring beauty of Arrakis.
   Participate in a controlled spice harvesting demonstration.

Learn essential desert survival skills from experienced Fremen guides.
   Master the art of sandwalking to avoid attracting sandworms.
schedule.description2:
Venture deep into the desert to observe the majestic sandworms in their natural habitat.
   Experience the thrill of calling a sandworm using traditional Fremen techniques.
